to spend on your favorite games.
The higher the gas price, the more expensive your transaction fee will be, but the quicker your transaction will be processed by the Ethereum network.
The gas limit prevents smart contracts from consuming all your Ethereum. We will try to calculate the gas limit automatically for you, but some smart contracts may require a custom gas limit.

We forked the Trust Wallet for Android project to bootstrap the Aptoide Wallet development. We considered it the best alternative regarding already implemented functionalities. We forked it with the intention of contributing back with implementations and work that would be considered relevant.

Ethereum is the cryptocurrency that AppCoins are based on. You can buy and sell them in most exchanges, it\'s very popular!
AppCoins is the cryptocurrency for the app economy. You can buy and sell it on several exchanges and use it to purchase in-app items.
The token to buy in-app items! Top up Aptoide balance or get it for free by using apps. They can also be transferred between friends!

Due to an unusual transaction history, your Aptoide balance was blocked. You\'ll still be able to make payments and transaction with other methods except Aptoide balance.\n\nIf you believe this is a mistake, contact us at:
There was a problem with your card. Please try with a different card or payment method.
The transaction has been rejected by your bank. Please try with a different card or payment method.
It seems you don\'t have enough funds or there\'s a limit on your card. Please try with a different card or payment method.
It seems your card is expired. Please try again with a different payment method.
Invalid card number. Please check it and try again.

If the problem persists please contact us.

Oops… Something is going on! Try with a different payment method or top-up amount.
Invalid bank card number. Please make sure all digits are correct.
There was an error on the 2nd level validation of this transaction. Please try again.
Your request was already processed or is in progress. Please wait.
The transaction has been rejected. Please try with a different card or payment method.

Verify your card to complete this purchase.

resources.string: %s in Aptoide balance will be deposited in your wallet.
It may take up to 2 days for your bank to process it.
You\'ll receive a bonus of %s in Aptoide balance.
We\'re waiting for the funds to arrive from your bank.
Once you receive the Aptoide balance, go back to the game and make the purchase using Aptoide balance as a payment method.
Once you receive the Aptoide balance, use it to make purchases in your favorite games!
Update the Aptoide Wallet to complete this purchase.
It seems you\'re using an old version of the Aptoide Wallet. Please update it to guarantee the best experience and security.
Keeping the Aptoide Wallet updated guarantees the best experience.
Back up your wallet before updating.
Choose a name for your backup file.
We don\'t store your private keys or any other access method. It\'s important to keep your wallet\'s backup (keystore) safe.
Your backup is ready!\nKeep it safe.
Print it and store it somewhere safe.
Copy it to a private and secure cloud storage.
Make a backup of your wallet!
Make a backup of your wallet!
Keep your funds safe and make sure you can always access your wallet.
I understand that I may lose my funds if I don\'t back up my wallet key.
Keep your funds safe at all times.
We couldn\'t create your backup file. Try again later.
Your backup is on your device
Your backup is on your email
We strongly recommend to back up a wallet before removing it. You\'ll not be able to access it again unless you\'ve got a backup.
Subscribe to services in your favorite apps and games and we\'ll deal with periodic payments.

You\'ll receive this bonus on each payment.

Amount spent to reach this level
Spend %s more to reach the next level.
\"The Earth is what we all have in common\" – Wendell Berry
\"That\'s one small step for a man, one giant leap for mankind\" – Neil Armstrong
\"I would like to die on Mars. Just not on impact.\" – Elon Musk
\"Everyone is a moon, and has a dark side which he never shows to anybody.\" – Mark Twain
\"All truths are easy to understand once they are discovered; the point is to discover them...\" – Galileo Galilei
\"If you find life on Europa, what would you call it? Would it be, like, Europeans?\" – Neil DeGrasse Tyson
\"The scientific theory I like best is that the rings of Saturn are composed entirely of lost airline luggage.\" – Mark Russell
\"I\'m sure the universe is full of intelligent life. It\'s just been too intelligent to come here.\" – Arthur C.Clarke
\"The moons of Uranus seem to have got a twist.\" – Sir Robert Stawell Ball
\"That star is not on the chart!\" – Heinrich d\'Arrest upon discovering Neptune.
\"Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known\" – Carl Sagan
